rooms.description: Spacious living area with minimalistic design featuring exposed concrete surfaces and natural lighting, adhering to Brutalist aesthetics. The room is positioned along the longer side of the plot for Vastu compliance.
Open dining area integrated with the living space for communal gatherings. Minimalist design and ample natural light are emphasized to align with Vastu and Brutalist principles.

Functional kitchen area with clean lines and exposed concrete finishes. Placed away from the main entrance but accessible for service areas, ensuring proper alignment with Vastu directional guidelines.
Guest bedroom designed with practical furnishings and robust concrete features. Positioned to maintain privacy while still adhering to Vastu directional alignments.

Spacious master suite featuring a built-in walk-in closet and adjoining en-suite bathroom. Utilizes Brutalist design with raw concrete surfaces and integrates natural light from strategically placed openings for Vastu compliance.
Private bathroom integrated within the master bedroom area, following Vastu guidelines for privacy and functionality with exposed materials and modern fixtures.

openings.description: Main entry door aligned with the auspicious north direction as per Vastu guidelines.
Service entrance ensuring minimal disruption to the primary living space.

central_courtyard.description: A central open courtyard that brings natural light and ventilation into the house. The courtyard is designed with a focus on Vastu principles ensuring proper flow of positive energy.

pool_area.description: Swimming pool area integrated into the landscape design to provide recreational space while preserving the architectural aesthetic.

rooms.description: Storage and utility room located above service areas, designed with minimalistic Brutalist style.
Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and open space for relaxation. Designed with robust concrete features and minimalistic landscaping in line with Brutalist aesthetics.
